desc:
We need to find a way to let certain people capture only certain fields while still allowing the normal process to continue as per normal. The fields that need to be captured are in the attached field list.

â€¢	Only Maintenance and Maintenance Substitution Orders need to be fast captured this way. Please exclude Divorce Orders.
â€¢	These fast captured data fields need to be available for searching upon by the as well as for reporting purposes in terms of the total amount verified/captured etc.
â€¢	The fast capture process must be a single capture, single verify process.
â€¢	The auto-sorter should provide the work to both processes at the time of sorting.
â€¢	A unique reference number should be assigned at the time of sorting so that the two processes can be linked up at the end when the two data records reach the Index 360 company.
â€¢	A new front end will need to be created as well as a new database to store this data.
â€¢	All fields can be on one screen as there are not enough to warrant separating them.
â€¢	Two new roles need to be created in client central called:
o	Index 360 Fast Capturer
o	Index 360 Fast Verifier
â€¢	These roles should only have access to the fast capture system.
â€¢	The Status Report should be updated to show, in addition to the current figures:
o	How many fast captured per month
o	How many fast captured all time
o	How many fast verified per month
o	How many fast verified all time
â€¢	The Capturer Invoice Index 360 report needs to include:
o	Maintenance Orders Fast Captured
o	Maintenance Orders Fast Verified
o	Maintenance Orders Fast On Hold
o	Maintenance Substitution Orders Fast Captured
o	Maintenance Substitution Orders Fast Verified
o	Maintenance Substitution Orders Fast On Hold

If you have any further questions please let me know. Also, please could you let me have a timeline of when this is will be available for testing.
name: CW - Fast Track/Capture
